Configuration.Name: L1=L2=4_central_apx12p5
Configuration.SetupScript:
config.wavelength = 6 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 3200 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 180 config.guide = 'g7' config.apx = -98 config.bs = 1 config.beamcenterx = 90.6097 config.beamcenterz = 96.1034
config.drive()
